text_block_list.name: Interviewer A
text_block_list.text: We've arrived at Hanshin Racecourse! Who's your favourite pick among the Umamusume?

text_block_list.name: Spectator A
text_block_list.text: I'd say Ikuno Dictus, maybe~. First place today, go for it, Ikuno!

text_block_list.name: Spectator B
text_block_list.text: I'm going with Mejiro Palmer, I guess. Last year's Takarazuka Kinen was the best!

text_block_list.name: Spectator C
text_block_list.text: Nishino Flower, perhaps. It might not be her best distance, but I sense potential in that girl...!

text_block_list.name: Spectator D
text_block_list.text: No, no, it's gotta be Mejiro McQueen here, right!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer A
text_block_list.text: Mejiro McQueen is the top pick for many attendees, too! What about you?
Yes, the microphone was extended toward——

text_block_list.name: Round-Glasses Reporter
text_block_list.text: She's so forward-looking and gives me courage. Today, I came to watch to get... some energy from her.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: We fought together in the 'Emperor's Cup (Spring),' and I've felt your rapid growth lately firsthand.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Today, the opponent I take note of the most is you. I'll give it my all...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow...! Same here! Today, please, let's do our best!
